snippet: By Tuesday night Mitt Romney was huddled with his children and grandchildren inside a hotel suite at the Westin, eating his favorite dish, meatloaf.
abstract: Mitt Romney displays his core characteristics on Election Day attending small, last-minute campaign events with a careful, disciplined and unemotional bearing; Romney's concession speech does sound tones of emotion, as he expresses disappointment and gratitude for those who aided his campaign.

byline.original: By ASHLEY PARKER and MICHAEL BARBARO
byline.contributor: Ashley Parker reported from Pittsburgh; Michael Barbaro from Boston.

lead_paragraph: By Tuesday night Mitt Romney was huddled with his children and grandchildren inside a hotel suite at the Westin, eating his favorite dish, meatloaf.

headline.main: Long Quest for Presidency Concludes With a Concession Speech
headline.print_headline: Long Quest for Presidency Concludes With a Concession Speech
